summary: Implements a NeMo model for zero‑shot intent recognition in dialogue systems. It loads pretrained sequence‑classification transformers, prepares specialized zero‑shot intent datasets, computes class weights, and provides training, validation, and inference pipelines with classification and dialogue generation metrics.
business_intent: Allow conversational AI platforms to automatically detect user intents in new domains without requiring annotated training data, reducing labeling effort and accelerating deployment of virtual assistants.
